## Vector2.CatmullRom() method

Gets a new Vector2 located for "amount" (float) on the CatmullRom spline defined by the given four Vector2

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static CatmullRom(value1: ReadOnlyVector2, value2: ReadOnlyVector2, value3: ReadOnlyVector2, value4: ReadOnlyVector2, amount: number): Vector2;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines 1st point of control |
|  value2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines 2nd point of control |
|  value3 | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines 3rd point of control |
|  value4 | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines 4th point of control |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | defines the interpolation factor |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector2`

a new Vector2
